activities.loc: Courtroom B, Third Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Raymond Joseph Havens

Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
INITIAL SCHEDULING ORDER

02:05 PM  Prosecuting attorney Cheniqua White appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Raymond Joseph Havens appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kelly J. Freeman appeared by video for Raymond Joseph Havens. Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily, rights given.  Court binds Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Information filed, copy to defendant, reading waived.  Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court.  Jury trial to be set.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on August 1, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

Activity:  Initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

03:31 PM Defendant Raymond Joseph Havens in court in custody by video from the Rock County Jail with attorney Faun Michelle Moses by video.  Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address and date of birth verified. Court orders $1000 Signature Bond with conditions:  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only.  Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. No contact with Co Defendant Elizabeth Anna Rose Malo. Adjourned initital appearance scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 1:00 PM.

No contact directly or indirectly with victim EARM, his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.  Absolute sobriety.  Level 4 pretrial services. Possess no controlled substance without valid prescription.
